title: KING DIAMOND Cancels Three Shows, Will Resume Tour Next Week
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: King Diamond has unfortunately cancelled his November 22 show in Calgary, AB; November 24 show in Portland, OR; and November 25 show in Seattle, WA. Diamond did not further comment on the cancellations, only noting that the tour will pick back up on November 27 at the Fox Theater in Oakland, CA. "Hello everyone, King Diamond here. It is with a heavy heart to inform you that tonight's show in Calgary is cancelled along with Portland and Seattle. This is something that we do not take lightly and will make this up to you in the future. "The St Lucifer's Hospital Tour will pick back in Oakland, CA on Nov. 27th through Dec. 12th in Mexico City. For those affected by the cancelled shows, tickets will be refunded by point of purchase. (Not by 3rd party seller). Stay Heavy." King Diamond is joined by black metal artist Myrkur for backing vocals and organ throughout the tour, while all shows are being opened by Overkill and Night Demon. Tickets are available here. 11/27 Fox Theater Oakland, CA11/29 Youtube Theater Los Angeles, CA11/30 The Theater At Virgin Hotels Las Vegas, NV12/1 Cal Coast Credit Union Open Air Theatre San Diego, CA12/2 The Van Buren Phoenix, AZ12/4 REVEL Albuquerque, NM12/6 The Factory In Deep Ellum Dallas, TX Want More Metal? html:
King Diamond has unfortunately cancelled his November 22 show in Calgary, AB; November 24 show in Portland, OR; and November 25 show in Seattle, WA. Diamond did not further comment on the cancellations, only noting that the tour will pick back up on November 27 at the Fox Theater in Oakland, CA.

"Hello everyone, King Diamond here. It is with a heavy heart to inform you that tonight's show in Calgary is cancelled along with Portland and Seattle. This is something that we do not take lightly and will make this up to you in the future.

"The St Lucifer's Hospital Tour will pick back in Oakland, CA on Nov. 27th through Dec. 12th in Mexico City. For those affected by the cancelled shows, tickets will be refunded by point of purchase. (Not by 3rd party seller). Stay Heavy."

King Diamond is joined by black metal artist Myrkur for backing vocals and organ throughout the tour, while all shows are being opened by Overkill and Night Demon. Tickets are available here.

11/27 Fox Theater Oakland, CA
11/29 Youtube Theater Los Angeles, CA
11/30 The Theater At Virgin Hotels Las Vegas, NV
12/1 Cal Coast Credit Union Open Air Theatre San Diego, CA
12/2 The Van Buren Phoenix, AZ
12/4 REVEL Albuquerque, NM
12/6 The Factory In Deep Ellum Dallas, TX
